item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in the New Haven area.

This week's location is:
Keys To the City aka Caffe Bottega or KTTC or Keys
Manager - Ari

KTTC & The NH Tango Club are working together to provide us a special HH. Keys is opening just for the NHC (normally closed Mondays) & the Tango Club which normally practices on Tuesday's will be at Keys teaching us how to dance. Yes - you read that correctly you can get a FREE dance lesson.

NHTC will provide tango instructors, music breath mints and local tango fanatics to help those learning for the first time. Post lesson dancing will also be available, some Tango, some Salsa, maybe even a little Blues.

Special thanks to NHCer Sarah and NH Tango Club member, as well as Chief Tangoer Patrick (NHTC Organizer) for arranging all of this for the NHC.

So c'mon out if you want to drink, c'mon out if you want to learn to Tango or c'mon out if you want to drink and Tango!!!

Drink Specials start at 6pm - $3 beers and mixed drinks
Food - An assortment of complimentary appetizers will be served (specifics to be announced but will likely reflect superbowl Sunday as Bottega is hosting a superbowl party the day before)


Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

Contact: Robyn-Allise 203 823 5302

***Bring a friend***
item.name: The NH Tango Club + Keys To The City = A Very Special HH for YOU!
